address2: 61st Floor No. 15 Zhujiang West Road Zhujiang New Town, Tianhe
longBusinessSummary: Puyi Inc. provides third-party wealth management services in China. The company distributes publicly raised fund and privately raised securities investment fund products through online and offline. It also offers insurance consulting, trust consulting, asset management, and corporate financing services. In addition, the company provides consulting and other services. Puyi Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jing  He
companyOfficers.title: Gen. Mang. of Financial Reporting Department
